stimulusHtml: The cultural trends referenced by Debray were mostly a result of which of the following?

features.html:
“Unfortunately, Americans focus more on Soviet military hardware than on [Soviets’] limited political prestige. That is responsible for your overestimation of Soviet power, as if power in history is the same as force of arms! What myopia and short-sightedness. There is more power in rock music, videos, blue jeans, fast food, news networks and TV satellites than in the entire Red Army.”

Régis Debray, leftist French philosopher, 1986

choicesHtml: The breakdown of economic and cultural barriers as a result of the formation of the European Economic Community
The increasing influence of American popular culture in Europe after the Second World War
The growing influence of French existentialist and postmodernist philosophers on Western European culture
The propaganda spread by the Soviet bloc to undermine European democracies
